EN copy:
Travel Insurance 50% OFF!

EN copy: Special offer HKD138 to enjoy “Underarm Unlimited Hair Removal Package“
ZH copy: HKD138尊享「兩腋下脫毛完了療程」
EN T&Cs:
1. This offer is only applicable to new customers.
2.Prior appointment for skin care consultation is required.
3. This offer can be used once for each person.
4. Our customer representative will be following the service booking after the enrollment.
5. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other promotional offers and cannot be refund.
6. Service provided by Musee Platinum Tokyo and Musee Medical Beauty Centre. For details, please call Musee Platinum Tokyo at 2169 – 4888 or Musee Medical Beauty Centre at 2169 – 4848.
7. MUSEE PLATINUM TOKYO and Musee Medical Beauty Centre reserves the right of final decision in case of any dispute.
8. Promotion period till 30 Jun 2017.
ZH T&Cs:
1. 以上優惠只適用於新客戶。
2. 療程前，必須先致電熱線預約諮詢進行皮膚分析。
3. 以上優惠每人限用1次。
4. 成功登記後，將有專人致電通知預約時間。
5. 以上優惠不可與其他優惠同時使用及不設退款。
6. 服務由Musee Platinum Tokyo 及Musee Medical Beauty Centre提供；如有任何優惠查詢，請直接聯絡Musee Platinum Tokyo : 2169 – 4888 或 Musee Medical Beauty Centre : 2169 – 4848。
7. 如有任何爭議，Musee Platinum Tokyo 及Musee Medical Beauty Centre 保留此優惠最終決定權。
8. 優惠期至2017年6月30日

EN copy: Free professional hair-scalp consultation and receive a Leonor Greyl Shampoo 14ml and hair care sample after completion. HKD50 discount upon purchase of regular-priced products at HKD300 or above.
ZH copy: 免費體驗專業頭皮及髮質分析服務，完成後可獲贈Leonor Greyl 洗髮露14ml及皇牌護髮產品體驗裝乙件。購買正價產品滿HKD300，即可獲HK$50折扣優惠。
EN T&Cs:
1. Offer is valid from May 1 to 31, 2017.
2. Customer are required to present the promotion email to enjoy the offers.
3. Customer can enjoy each offers once only. Quota applies on all gifts and is available on a first-come, first-served basis while stocks last.
4. Offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other promotional offers.
5. In case of any disputes, Leonor Greyl reserves the right of final decision
ZH T&Cs:
1. 優惠期由2017年5月1日至5月31日
2. 客戶須出示有效電郵優惠證明，方可享以上優惠。
3. 每人只限享用優惠乙次，贈品數量有限，送完即止。
4. 以上優惠不可與其他優惠同時使用
5. 如有任何爭議，Leonor Greyl保留最終決定權。

EN T&Cs:
1. 20% discount cannot be exchange to cash.
2. Offer cannot be used in conjunction with VIP discount and other promotion offers.
3. Bonluxe Asia Ltd reserve the right to amend this promotion without prior notice.
ZH T&Cs:
1. 全單8折優惠不能換取現金
2. 優惠不得與會員折扣或與其他優惠同用
3. 葆露絲亞洲有限公司保留以上優惠之決定權

EN copy:
Deliver Anything Locally within 1 Hour!
Lalamove connects you with the best delivery drivers nearby. Deliver faster with less hassle.
Register now! Enjoy HKD20 discount by entering “LALAZALORA“
ZH copy:
Lalamove 送嘢拿拿聲!
立即登記體驗更快、更好、更易的運送服務！
使用優惠代碼“LALAZALORA“，即享獨家$20折扣優惠！
EN T&Cs:
1. Enter this code to enjoy the special discount when placing an order.
2. Not in conjunction with any other offer.
3. This offer is only valid for first-time users.
4. Code "LALAZALORA" valid from now until 30 June 2017.
5. For enquires, please contact us at (852) 3701 3701.
6. Lalamove reserves the right of final decision if any disputes.
ZH T&Cs:
1. 於下單時便用優惠碼「LALAZALORA」即享折扣優惠。
2. 不可與其他優惠同時使用。
3. 只適用於首次用戶。
4. 優惠有效期至2017年6月30日。
5. 如有任何查詢，歡迎致電 (852) 3701 3701。
6. 如有任何爭議，Lalamove將保留最終決定權。

EN copy:

Register now and get extra HKD20 welcome offer.

This offer is only valid for new registration via this link. New DOU4LA member account should be activated before 30 Apr 2017.
Code “ZALORA10” valid until 31 May 2017.

EN copy: Enjoy Himalayan Salt Stone Massage, Facial Massage and Eye Treatment with special offer HKD288. (Total Value: HKD1,300)
ZH copy: 以優惠價HKD288盡享三項療程，包括：獨家岩鹽熱石身體按摩、皇牌Miris Spa Facial Massage面部護理及眼部亮澤水漾護理。(總值：HKD1,300)
EN T&Cs:
1. Only valid for first-time visit female customers aged 18 or above or old female customers who have not use our service for 6 months.
2. Each customer can enjoy the above promotional offer once only.
3. Only valid for Hong Kong residents.
4. Miris Spa has four branches: Tsim Sha Tsui, Causeway Bay, Mong Kok, Tsuen Wan.
5. For any enquiry or booking, please contact Miris Spa at (852)68400488
6. All matters or disputes will be subject to the final decision of Miris Spa.
ZH T&Cs:
1. 優惠只適用於年滿18歲或以上之女性新客戶或6個月以上未有使用服務之舊客戶。
2. 每人只限體驗以上優惠一次。
3. 優惠只適用於持有效身份証的香港居民。
4. 可選擇在以下分店進行療程：尖沙咀、銅鑼灣、旺角、荃灣。
5. 查詢或預約請致電(852)68400488。
6. 如有任何爭議，Miris Spa保留最終決定權。
